Title: Slash 3
Actors: Jack Stanis, Colleen Kelly, Victoria Simone, Mike Funk
Plot: 5 months after Jack Anderson and Jonathan Franco were attacked by Cody and Amanda, Jack and his thought to be dead girlfriend move to Massachusetts to start a new life in a new school. Soon after their arrival, things begin to happen in a much to familiar way. A new ghostface killer has risen. This time...it's personal.
